13  package net.sf.oval.test.guard;
14  
15  import junit.framework.TestCase;
16  import net.sf.oval.ConstraintViolation;
17  import net.sf.oval.constraint.NotNull;
18  import net.sf.oval.context.FieldContext;
19  import net.sf.oval.context.MethodParameterContext;
20  import net.sf.oval.exception.ConstraintsViolatedException;
21  import net.sf.oval.guard.ConstraintsViolatedAdapter;
22  import net.sf.oval.guard.Guarded;
23  import net.sf.oval.guard.PostValidateThis;
24  import net.sf.oval.guard.PreValidateThis;
25  
26  /**
27   * @author Sebastian Thomschke
28   */
29  public class PrePostValidateThisTest extends TestCase
30  {
31  	@Guarded(applyFieldConstraintsToSetters = true, checkInvariants = false)
32  	public static class TestEntity
33  	{
34  		@NotNull(message = "NOT_NULL")
35  		public String name;
36  
37  		public TestEntity()
38  		{
39  		// do nothing
40  		}
41  
42  		@PostValidateThis
43  		public TestEntity(final String name)
44  		{
45  			this.name = name;
46  		}
47  
48  		@PreValidateThis
49  		public String getName()
50  		{
51  			return name;
52  		}
53  
54  		public void setName(final String name)
55  		{
56  			this.name = name;
57  		}
58  
59  		@PostValidateThis
60  		public void setNamePost(final String name)
61  		{
62  			this.name = name;
63  		}
64  	}
65  
66  	public void testConstructorValidation()
67  	{
68  		try
69  		{
70  			new TestEntity(null);
71  
72  			fail();
73  		}
74  		catch (final ConstraintsViolatedException e)
75  		{
76  			final ConstraintViolation[] violations = e.getConstraintViolations();
77  			assertNotNull(violations);
78  			assertEquals(1, violations.length);
79  			assertEquals("NOT_NULL", violations[0].getMessage());
80  			assertTrue(violations[0].getContext() instanceof FieldContext);
81  		}
82  
83  		new TestEntity("test");
84  	}
85  
86  	public void testMethodValidation()
87  	{
88  		final TestEntity t = new TestEntity();
89  
90  		try
91  		{
92  			t.getName();
93  			fail();
94  		}
95  		catch (final ConstraintsViolatedException e)
96  		{
97  			final ConstraintViolation[] violations = e.getConstraintViolations();
98  			assertNotNull(violations);
99  			assertTrue(violations.length > 0);
100 			assertEquals("NOT_NULL", violations[0].getMessage());
101 			assertTrue(violations[0].getContext() instanceof FieldContext);
102 		}
103 
104 		t.setName("test");
105 
106 		try
107 		{
108 			t.setName(null);
109 			fail();
110 		}
111 		catch (final ConstraintsViolatedException e)
112 		{
113 			final ConstraintViolation[] violations = e.getConstraintViolations();
114 			assertNotNull(violations);
115 			assertTrue(violations.length > 0);
116 			assertEquals("NOT_NULL", violations[0].getMessage());
117 			assertTrue(violations[0].getContext() instanceof MethodParameterContext);
118 		}
119 
120 		t.setName("the name");
121 		assertNotNull(t.getName());
122 	}
123 
124 	public void testMethodValidationInProbeMode()
125 	{
126 		final TestEntity t = new TestEntity();
127 
128 		TestGuardAspect.aspectOf().getGuard().enableProbeMode(t);
129 
130 		final ConstraintsViolatedAdapter va = new ConstraintsViolatedAdapter();
131 		TestGuardAspect.aspectOf().getGuard().addListener(va, t);
132 
133 		// test non-getter precondition failed
134 		t.getName();
135 		assertTrue(va.getConstraintsViolatedExceptions().size() == 1);
136 		assertTrue(va.getConstraintViolations().size() == 1);
137 		assertTrue(va.getConstraintViolations().get(0).getMessage().equals("NOT_NULL"));
138 		va.clear();
139 
140 		t.setName(null);
141 		assertTrue(va.getConstraintsViolatedExceptions().size() == 1);
142 		assertTrue(va.getConstraintViolations().size() == 1);
143 		assertTrue(va.getConstraintViolations().get(0).getMessage().equals("NOT_NULL"));
144 		va.clear();
145 
146 		// test post-condition ignored even if pre-conditions satisfied
147 		t.setNamePost(null);
148 		assertTrue(va.getConstraintsViolatedExceptions().size() == 0);
149 
150 		// test setter
151 		t.setName("the name");
152 		assertTrue(va.getConstraintsViolatedExceptions().size() == 0);
153 		assertTrue(va.getConstraintViolations().size() == 0);
154 
155 		// test getter returns null because we are in probe mode
156 		t.name = "the name";
157 		assertNull(t.getName());
158 		assertTrue(va.getConstraintsViolatedExceptions().size() == 0);
159 		assertTrue(va.getConstraintViolations().size() == 0);
160 	}
161 }
